Html:
I have an application with D3 embedded in it.  I tried to reproduce my problem in a simple app, but in there, it works fine.

Problem: the y-axis in my charts comes up initially with no labels and 10 tick marks.  if i zoom in or our, then i get the desired tick marks and time labels.

Is there a method I can call on the chart or the axis to force it to regenerate the ticks and labels?

I appreciate any ideas or suggestions...

Hi, Michael,

 

Can you please send me a screenshot of this bug?

Also you can try new version of DynamicDataDisplay - maybe this bug is fixed in it, - it is here: http://cid-eaf0a921258b5980.skydrive.live.com/self.aspx/.Public/D3/DynamicDataDisplay%20June%2026.rar

 

Best regards,

Mikhail Brinchuk.
